# notificationIdentifiersOperator

**Instance Property**

The operator that defines how to use the notification identifiers in the search criteria.

## Declaration

```swift
var notificationIdentifiersOperator: INConditionalOperator { get }
```

## Discussion

This property indicates whether the message must contain all, some, or none of the identifiers in the [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INSearchForMessagesIntent/notificationIdentifiers] property.

## Specifying Message Identifiers

- **identifiers**: The message identifiers to locate in your search.
- **identifiersOperator**: The operator that defines how to use the identifiers in the search criteria.
- **conversationIdentifiers**: The conversation identifiers to locate in your search.
- **conversationIdentifiersOperator**: The operator that defines how to use the conversation identifiers in the search criteria.
- **notificationIdentifiers**: The notification identifiers to locate in your search.
